original_text: And his brightness was as the light; he had horns coming out of his hand: and there was the hiding of his power.
korean_text: 그의 광명이 햇빛 같고 광선이 그의 손에서 나오니 그의 권능이 그 속에 감추어졌도다

sentences.original_text: And his brightness was as the light
he had horns coming out of his hand
and there was the hiding of his power
